TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBoundControlAdapter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.WebControlAdapter

summary.span: 根据特定浏览器请求自定义与适配器关联的 对象的行为。

span.span: Customizes the behavior of a object with which the adapter is associated for specific browser requests.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 从类派生的控件绑定到数据源, 并通过枚举它所绑定到的数据源中的项来生成其用户界面或子控件层次结构。A control derived from the class is bound to a data source and generates its user interface or child control hierarchy by enumerating the items in the data source to which it is bound. 是一个抽象基类, 用于定义可绑定到数据源的所有控件 (如和控件) 的公共特性。 is an abstract base class that defines the common characteristics of all controls that can be bound to a data source, such as the and controls. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . 用于修改特定浏览器或浏览器类的的行为, 或充当某些功能的筛选器。 A modifies the behavior of a for a specific browser or class of browsers, or acts as a filter on some capability. 呈现行为中的大部分适应性都可以封装在派生自类的专用类中。Much of the adaptability in rendering behavior can be encapsulated in the specialized classes that derive from the class. 因此, 可以将单个适配器用于许多浏览器类行为, 或在类中包含适应性, 使控件适配器不必要地使用。Therefore, it is likely that a single adapter can be used for a number of browser class behaviors or that inclusion of the adaptability in the classes can make the use of a control adapter unnecessary. 如果这些文件中有``条目, 则每个控件都通过 .browser 定义文件显式映射到适配器。Each control has explicit mappings to adapters through the .browser definition files, if there are `` entries in these files. 因此, 对的 属性的任何访问都使用从浏览器定义文件中提取的对象来执行要控制的适配器映射。Thus, any access to the property of the uses the object extracted from the .browser definition files to perform the lookup for the mapping of the adapter to control. 在处理过程中, .NET Framework 会截获对某个控件的方法的调用, 该控件可能是特定于浏览器的。During processing, the .NET Framework intercepts calls to the methods of a control that could be browser specific. 如果附加了控件适配器, .NET Framework 将调用关联的适配器方法。If a control adapter is attached, the .NET Framework calls the associated adapter methods. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see . M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding (System.object) 方法将可枚举集合绑定到关联的。The M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter.PerformDataBinding(System.Collections.IEnumerable) method binds an enumerable collection to the associated . 属性返回对的强类型引用。 The property returns a strongly typed reference to the . ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建并使用两个派生控件:The following code examples create and use two derived controls: - 派生自的类是一个简单的只读网格控件。 `MyDataBound`The `MyDataBound` class, derived from , is a simple read-only grid control. - 派生自的类将网格数据呈现为包含行分隔符的一维列表, 适用于小型屏幕浏览器。 `MyDataBoundAdapter`The `MyDataBoundAdapter` class, derived from , renders the grid data as a one-dimensional list with row separators, suitable for small screen browsers. 第一个代码示例使用网页声明一个`MyDataBound`控件和一个实例, 该实例以对象的形式提供数据。The first code example uses a Web page to declare a `MyDataBound` control and an instance of that provides data in the form of a object. 第二个代码示例包含派生`MyDataBound`的`MyDataBoundAdapter`和类:The second code example contains the derived `MyDataBound` and `MyDataBoundAdapter` classes: - `` 类将重写方法以保存数据源的集合, 并重写方法以 HTML 格式呈现数据源。 `MyDataBound`The `MyDataBound` class overrides the method to save an collection for the data source, and overrides the method to render the data source as an HTML `
`. - 类将重写, 以将数据源保存到一维并添加行分隔符。 `MyDataBoundAdapter`The `MyDataBoundAdapter` class overrides to save the data source to a one-dimensional and add row separators.它重写以将呈现为按`
`标记分隔的字段列表。It overrides to render the as a list of fields separated by `
` tags. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#1)] 第三个代码示例使用配置文件指定不将任何控件适配器与`MyDataBound` Microsoft Internet Explorer 浏览器的控件一起使用, 并`MyDataBoundAdapter`将与`MyDataBound`用于 Openwave 的控件的控件一起使用。The third code example uses a configuration file to specify that no control adapter is to be used with `MyDataBound` controls for Microsoft Internet Explorer browsers, and that a `MyDataBoundAdapter` is used with `MyDataBound` controls for Openwave UP browsers.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在创建相应 的对象时, 在内部构造类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the corresponding object.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property Control As DataBoundControl

summary.span: 检索对与此控件适配器关联的 对象的强类型引用。

span.span: Retrieves a strongly-typed reference to the object associated with this control adapter.
The to which this is attached.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当对象附加到控件时, .NET Framework 将调用某些适配器成员而不是控件成员。 When a object is attached to a control, the .NET Framework calls certain adapter members instead of the control members. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 从类派生的适配器中的属性。The following code example shows how to override the property in an adapter derived from the class. 它返回对`MyDataBound`控件的强类型引用。It returns a strongly typed reference to the `MyDataBound` control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#2)]

para.span: 从类继承时, 至少应实现属性以返回控件的强类型实例, 如 "示例" 部分所示。

span.span: When you inherit from the class, you should, at a minimum, implement a property to return a strongly typed instance of the control, as shown in the Example section

summary.span: 将关联的 对象的数据源中的数据绑定到控件适配器。

span.span: Binds the data in the data source of the associated object to the control adapter.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 当控件适配器附加到从 类派生的控件时 , 将调用方法来替代方法。The method is called in place of the method when a control adapter is attached to a control derived from the class. 通常, 重写遍历数据, 并在必要时创建不同的名称和值, 并将其保存到内部集合。Typically, an override of iterates through data, creating distinct names and values when necessary, and saves it to an internal collection. 通常, 或的类似方法会从该内部集合填充用户界面或子控件。Usually, or a similar method of the will populate the user interface or child controls from that internal collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写集合, 以将数据源保存到一维对象并添加行分隔符。The following code example shows how to override the collection to save the data source to a one-dimensional object and add row separators. 它还演示如何重写方法, 以将呈现为按`
`标记分隔的字段列表。It also shows how to override the method to render the as a list of fields separated by `
` tags. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/CS/mydatabound.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.Adapters.DataBoundControlAdapter/VB/mydatabound.vb#3)]

para.span: 如果目标浏览器需要专用绑定逻辑, 则重写方法,例如,当项名称的构造方式与控件的常规用法不同。

span.span: Override the method when specialized binding logic is required for the target browser - for example, when item names must be constructed differently than for the general usage of the control.

para.span: 仅当需要的数据绑定功能时, 才应调用基方法。

span.span: You should call the base method only if you require the data binding functionality of the .
